name: Wolf: The Evolution Story
description: 'Wolf: The Evolution' is a simulator which tells a tale of adventure. Welcome to the Silverglade Pack, a small family struggling to get a foothold in the wilderness. You must help them to expand and grow until they can realise their dreams!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct 3D compatible graphics card with 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
